Module com.example.projekt
Package com.example.projekt.controllers

Class ListController<T>

java.lang.Object
com.example.projekt.controllers.ListController<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the list items.
Direct Known Subclasses:
CategoriesController, ManufacturersController, ProductsController
public abstract class ListController<T> extends Object
Abstract controller for the list view.
